entry.question: Can I do damage to my opponent’s characters or only my own?
entry.answer: Much like Scouting Mission, you can choose any player’s character for this card.

entry.question: What happens if I damage a non-Specialist character?
entry.answer: That character gets +2 ATK until end of turn and no cards are drawn.

entry.question: What happens if I damage my opponent’s character and it is a Specialist?
entry.answer: That character will get +2 ATK until end of turn and your opponent will draw a card.

entry.question: What happens if I choose an enemy Specialist that is wearing Holomatter Projector or Defense Driving or has Sturdy?
entry.answer: The ability on the card will only cause someone to draw if a Specialist is damaged this way. Cards or abilities preventing or reducing damage to 0 will not result in the character’s owner drawing a card.
